attributes.comment:
Dear Agent:

I am writing to you concerning the current trend to increase the fees for a family
completing the Form I-600 to receive a Form I-171H. Please consider keeping
fees the same as they currently are. I do appreciate the fact that revenue is
necessary to continue programs, however, currently families who are adopting
from foreign countries often have to apply and thus pay twice for said forms. I
know that part of adopting is taking on the responsibility of the financial issues,
however, it seems like double jeopardy to me. We had to apply for our first I-171H
in order to be accepted into the program. We had no choice because the I-171H
is required to admitted into the queue of waiting adoptive parents, even though we
knew that time lines of adopting and I-171H validity did not match. Now due to
extended time frames for adoption and travel, we will probably have to go through
the process again. Please consider this request! Thanks so much for your time.
I appreciate the opportunity to share my opinion with you! Best wishes for a
successful resolution to this issue that serves both the government agency and
the individuals in the best way.

Respectfully yours,

Connie S. Strebe

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Connie S. Strebe
